Cubic spline:

S(1) = 0+0,52409375(x - 0)+0(x - 0)^2-0,024093750000000014(x - 0)^3


S(2) = 0,5+0,45181249999999995(x - 1)-0,07228125000000005(x - 1)^2-0,01350124999999996(x - 1)^3

S(X*) = 0,70614828125
